name: Shoaib Aslam ACA FMAAT
title: Founder & CEO - We’re The Accountant's Accountant!
summary:
Are you an accountancy firm owner? Do you feel overwhelmed with the tight profit margins, ongoing staff issues or maybe outsourcing failed for you? Perhaps you aren't making enough profit and you want somebody to take it off your hands but you don’t want to sell up?

If this is you, you're on the right page!

We can manage your entire firm for you (whilst you retire!)

Who Am I?

I started my first accountancy practice in 2008 with only £10 in my pocket. In just a few years my practice was turning over £1M a year with zero debt, having qualified with PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) as one of their youngest Chartered Accountants in the Country.

I’ve spoken at national events including the BBC, QuickBooks, and am a motivational speaker at several universities. Interviews with me have appeared on various accounting networks such as AccountingWeb and Sage.

I have always been highly interested in technology, and consider myself more of a tech and business guy than an accountant. I have received hands-on training by some of the biggest names in marketing, which knowledge I have used to increase my companies' market share in the industry.

I run several businesses, all in some way related to accounting or consultancy. My accountancy practice has won multiple awards, including runner-up for QuickBooks's FIRM OF THE FUTURE AWARD due to our firm's efficiency and productivity in systems and controls.

My business, We Run Your Practice, has revolutionised "Outsourcing" for accountancy practices, offering a never-before-heard-of method of managing an accountancy firm's day-to-business where we take on all the workload and yet the practice keeps its clients and its profits.

I am on LinkedIn in order to connect with professionals who are serious about business. In a tight-margin industry such as accounting, which is highly regulated and closely monitored, I have learned that there are no substitutes in business for competence, effectiveness, and reliability.

I am a LinkedIn Open Networker. Anyone is welcome to connect with me. I look forward to meeting you and hopefully doing business together.

Why not get in touch today for a chat? I’d love to hear from you.

Book a call with me here: https://werunyourpractice.com/contact-us/

WHO DO I WORK WITH?

If you are an ambitious business owner who is driven and willing to take action then we can help you unlock the potential.

Simply inbox me here on Linkedin briefly detailing your business and it's current position. After which I will happily arrange a FREE business strategy call with you. 🟠 We help companies making more profit than the owners spend that want a tax efficient structure to create long term wealth.
🔵 We work with companies to avoid the significant trading risk of asset ownership with practical ownership strategies for wealth protection
🟢 We specialise in digging in deep to help business owners like you avoid wasting thousands of pound a year in excessive tax by not planning your remuneration package properly
🔴 We help you to figure out how to financially motivate key employees while saving the company money too


For the last 17 years, we have had the pleasure of working with and supporting hundreds of small highly profitable businesses. We’ve helped them in many ways such as:

✔️ Removing that nagging doubt, they could do better with tax planning by a root and branch review of the owner’s remuneration structure
✔️ Removing savings from high risk and litigation filled businesses to be protected and grow in a low or zero tax cost structure, ringfenced from the trading business
✔️ Using the business to provide for a significant and meaningful retirement fund, to allow  comfortable and safe retirement
✔️ Keeping key people within the business by allowing a high net remuneration structure while at the same time, minimizing the cost for the employer company
✔️ Allowing for the purchase of new companies , by carrying out cost effective due diligence, valuation reports and structuring advice
✔️ Being true tax advisors first


But don’t just take my word for it..... Have a look at what some of my current clients have to say about working with me and the team at JLA:

name: Garry Mumford
title: Managing Director and Founder
summary:
When your company hits £1-£2m turnover, it changes rapidly. You hire new staff, develop new marketing systems, perhaps get a bigger office and invest in infrastructure.

But often your financial management systems don’t develop at the same pace.

The bookkeeper that suited you when you turned over £500K may struggle to keep up-to-date. Your accounting software may be outdated, and directors can’t easily access the information they need. Cash flow might be an issue, draining your time.

The result?

-	You’re not sure the information in your financial reports is accurate – it doesn’t reflect what you know or believe is happening.

-	You may have made poor decisions, because your true financial situation wasn’t clear.

-	Worst case scenario? You’ve had a nasty surprise, like a VAT bill that was much higher than expected, because your accounts were not well managed.

I founded Insight Associates 24 years ago to help companies like yours develop the same financial processes and skills corporate companies have, so you can run more smoothly, plan effectively and generate more profit.

When you hire us as your outsourced finance department, you receive accurate, timely reporting. We put in place all the systems a grown-up company needs to manage its finances.
Most importantly as your FD/CFO, we help you interpret the numbers so they are useful to you – not just something you have to have.

After working with us, customers tell us:

- “I finally trust the numbers I’m seeing”
- “I make decisions about where to invest more confidently, because they’re based on real financial information”
- “I can spend more time developing my business, because I no longer have to fight financial fires”
- “We’re no longer exposed financially – it’s a big relief!”

If that’s those are the kind of outcomes you want to see, please email me on gmumford@insightassociates.co.uk

We represent clients with a £1-10m turnover in the Home Counties/London/East Anglia, and would love to help you too.

name: Gareth Burton FCA
title: Founder
summary:
Hi, I’m Gareth

Never giving up is a motto of mine.

I've been told several times in my life, that what I was planning to do was impossible.  From the professional to the personal.

When I left Deloitte to set up my own Pension Audit practice, I was told it couldn't be done.  That was 2003 and I am still pinching myself that it was possible and Assure UK is alive and well.

But, I faced my own challenge with it's not possible in 2018. I was on the verge of sacking my accountant because I just couldn't get the same level of personal service that we gave our audit clients.

The problem was, this was the same as the 3 accountants before them. I almost believed that it wasn't going to be possible to find an accountant who, like our audit business, invested heavily in technology to approve efficiency whilst still giving good old-fashioned service.  Like the service our parents expect.

And that's when I had the Brainwave.  And progress became less of a twinkle in my eye and more of a real accountancy practice.  Like Assure UK, personal service is at the heart of what we do.  But, just for our own audit business we wanted the best cloud based tools, we offer these to our clients.  Because it's not just about having the technology, it's about really using it to its fullest extent.

To make sure we are giving that level of service, at Progress Accountants we work best with owners of small professional service firms and people connected with the pensions industry. After all, that's been my life since 2003.

Together we’ll focus on one of these two areas:
👍 Assure UK.  Join over 100 clients who benefit from our proven process to obtain timely pension scheme accounts and assurance reports.
👍 Progress Accountants.  Tailored support for your business.  Unlike many accountants, we are a team which can come in (or work virtually) and do bookkeeping, implementation of systems and training, right through to supporting you with your business plan.

name: Jan Post
title: Founder and Managing Director
summary:
For over 20 years, I've been a passionate tax refund champion for individuals and small businesses. From a family of entrepreneurs with a background in estate agency and small business support, I've always fought against the norm and striven to provide innovative and great value financial services for my customers.

So here's a bit about me! Our Kent based family run estate agency business, Hellery and Lane broke the norms of conveyancing over 30 years ago by offering a fixed price service to buyers and sellers.  The conveyancing establishment didn't always welcome us, but our customers felt they were getting great value for money and a fair, fast no-nonsense service. This innovation helped to make Hellery and Lane the most successful local estate agency of it's era. After my father died in the early 80's, we eventually sold the business to Mann & Co. Ashford.

In the early 1990's I formed a small business support company, providing virtual accounting, PA, HR, Payroll and tax advice services plus rented office space, helping small businesses and start-ups begin their ventures. Through this I got to know many of the construction companies that had come to Kent to work on the Channel Tunnel Rail Link (CTRL).  Their workers, some PAYE some self-employed or CIS were accumulating mileage whilst travelling to Kent and between other sites that they were not effectively claiming tax relief for.

I spotted a way I could help these workers directly, and in 1999 RIFT Tax Refunds was formed to offer a hassle free, no upfront cost service.  We now offer a tax refund service to more than 55,000 workers across Construction, Armed Forces, Oil & Gas, Security, Sports & other sectors.

The RIFT Group now employs over 160 people and has reclaimed over £135 million in tax refunds for our customers.

I was honoured and delighted to be listed as one of the 40 most influential business leaders in Kent in 2015 and to have been listed in the Kent MegaGrowth50 for the past 2 years.

That said, I have a great working knowledge of company formations, PAYE/VAT/Company tax, annual accounts preparation, claimable expenses, personal tax issues, Companies House returns, and regularly keep up to date with tax/accounting changes that affect contractors through publications, training courses, and a team of external tax specialists I have at my disposal.

The main satisfaction I get is in being part of an accounting service that works hard to keep the client front and center. summary:
The Financial Management Centre is a leading financial management consultancy that is committed to helping organisations achieve performance excellence.

In today’s challenging environment, there are many untapped opportunities. Capitalising on them may require new management methods, efficient utilisation of assets and exceptional financial management talent and knowledge. We enable you to succeed through our innovation, performance and passion.

The Financial Management Centre provides you with the necessary skills and insight through its highly qualified and experienced professionals. Whether you need a part-time bookkeeper for a new start-up, a part-time and highly experienced financial controller, a complete finance and accounts department, or an entire enterprise resource planning system, we can examine, develop and answer your needs.

We have three categories of service for organisations of all sizes and in all stages of growth. These services are The Online Bookkeeper, The Local Bookkeeper and The Local Accounts Department.

• The Online Bookkeeper is an innovative and collaborative service that is highly flexible in its delivery to the client. It combines secure and stable online accounting software with the professional services of The Local Bookkeeper.

• The Local Bookkeeper delivers bookkeeping, management accounts, credit control, payroll and self assessment tax return services. It becomes a ‘financial cornerstone’ within your business, providing regular and up-to-date information in language that is easy to understand, giving you the tools to drive your business to success.

• The Local Accounts Department provides professional accounting and financial management services to ambitious and fast-growing businesses, helping them to raise response and performance levels. It enables businesses to outsource entire accounts departments, cutting costs while providing a finance department with the security of qualified and experienced experts.

Specialties: Bookkeeping
Management Accounts
Payroll
Credit Control
Online Accounting Software
Accounts Outsourcing
Business Planning

summary:
Put me in front of a computer with the most disordered, tangled, incomplete records with tight deadlines and I morph into a bookkeeping and accounting wiz. Analytical skills buzzing as I explore the best solutions whilst considering the business resources and requirements. Knowledgeable, confident and energetic, I unravel the chaos and implement financial systems and processes that support business operations.

Ask me to talk about myself and what I have to offer, and I become disordered and tangled. I struggle to sell myself as I am a doer not a talker.  However, I do not shy away from a challenge.

I find it important to promote effective bookkeeping. It could be said liberating SMEs from outdated, manual heavy processes and systems is my passion. I am constantly thinking of ways to improve processes and so, I created III Synectics to overcome the static approach to bookkeeping.

I implement and maintain strong bookkeeping systems to save time, money and sanity, because poor processes and messy records are enough to drive anyone crazy. I am confident that strong bookkeeping systems have the power to transform and improve any business.

We help SME business owners get their in-house accounting working how it should be - helping to improve profits and optimise the cash, rather than just dealing with the paperwork.

Our proven "YRH Best Practice methodology" developed specifically for SME's who are growing or "stuck", combined with our unique team approach which enables clients to access the best accounting talent on an affordable basis, means we can easily and quickly remove the stress and headaches that business owners suffer as their business naturally needs more than family members or an unqualified bookkeeper, or the traditional accountants doing annual or quarterly accounts that don't quite seem to connect with the business day to day.

As businesses become more complex they get harder to manage at a detail level which can lead to financial challenges. We can help you overcome those challenges and by systemising and optimising the accounting activities so everything runs smoothly and efficiently, and talking you through insightful financial information and forecasts that will help you make the best informed decisions.

name: Ross Marquis

summary:
Professional bookkeeping services working with you to help you grow your business

Are you a business owner spinning lots of plates while trying to focus on growing your business? Busy Bookkeeping understands your needs, providing SME's with the financial expertise needed to achieve their business goals. As professional bookkeepers based in London we work with a variety of clients across the UK. Our aim is to become a trusted day-to-day adviser to all our clients, while often being more affordable and accessible than an accountant on those everyday tasks and queries.

•	Are you running up to date accounting software? We set up and run the latest software and provide training.

•	Do you receive regular Management Reports? We provide periodical management reporting, and we will discuss it with you to help you focus on the positives and negatives.

•	Is your business growing, but you are not ready to employ a full-time bookkeeper? We can provide a fully outsourced finance function including bookkeeping, client billing, debtor and creditor management.

We can streamline your bookkeeping and admin processes to increase efficiencies and help your business grow. Using software like Xero allows us to provide regular reports on your business, something you may not normally receive until end-of -year financials. You deserve a bookkeeper who is as passionate about your business as you are – when you succeed, we succeed.

Our services include:

•	Running of payroll through your software with associated HMRC filings;
•	VAT preparation and submission complying Making-Tax-Digital;
•	Day-to-day bookkeeping;
•	Liaising with accountants to facilitate to smooth year end processes; and
•	Use of software to streamline admin to be as paperless as possible.

If you want to take your business to the next level by spending more time focusing on your business’ growth, please get in touch by messaging me and let’s connect!

Natalie is an outstanding finance professional with over two decades of significant achievement driving growth and generating cost savings across multiple industry sectors. She now directs her substantial skills and energy to supporting young companies, high-growth start-ups and owner-managed SMEs, contributing her unique blend of strategic vision, commercial expertise and financial guidance to help them grow and prosper. She specialises in capacity planning, building up a young company’s finance function and establishing scalable controls and systems, thus freeing up management to concentrate on developing a profitable business.

Natalie’s first post-qualification role was as European Finance Manager with the UK division of a major US document management company. She brought their accounting system in-house, recruited and trained a Finance team, and set up a Shared Service Centre, controls and procedures to cope with Europe-wide business expansion. Similar roles followed at Sony UK and at SeeBeyond Technology, where she streamlined financial management and optimised business efficiency to realise substantial savings.

She was then recruited to carry out a range of projects for SABMiller plc, at the same time launching a successful riding and trekking centre in Spain. Following the sale of the business, she joined the family company, Birtley House Group, in 2007 as Head of Finance and Company Secretary, providing the business with strong financial controls and a sound basis for onward development.

In 2012, Natalie started work as a freelance portfolio consultant, bringing substantial benefits to a wide range of UK companies.

name: Lorna Leonard FCCA, CMgr FCMI
title: Co-Founder and Managing Director
summary:
Unlike traditional accountancy firms we care about your numbers 365 days of the year. In our world, it's not about month or year end, it's making sure that every day you and your business has the cash and insight to achieve your and your investors goals.

Its probably easier to say what we don't do:
 - Statutory audits, but we will manage the process for you when the auditors visit
 - Tax, but we can introduce some amazing tax boffins to you
 - Play around with the numbers for number's sake.  We will always give you a straight answer to your question, and not shy away from any difficult conversations.

You may be wondering what we actually do? Recently, an investor bought us into one of their companies as they needed it to "stand up on their own two feet". This is quite an apt description of why we are used. We understand what investors need, such as worrying about breaching a covenant, which is why they regularly bring us in to their companies. On a practical level, this can mean as a part time FD, or it could be the outsourced finance dept. or even finance business partner or CEO confidante. Probably the best word or words which describe what we do are part time chief operating officer. Fighting fires, eliminating the bottlenecks, and getting our clients back to stability are what we are particularly known for.

Our clients are typically:
 - fast growth, be it an ambitious startup or a mature business starting to think about exit or a management buyout.
 - occasionally it maybe a business which is in crisis and needs some turnaround support.
 - £1m+ turnover, and paying a minimum of £1000 a month for our firms services.

Unlike many part time FD's, we are a team which can come in and do bookkeeping upwards, implementation of systems and training, right through to supporting you at your board meetings.

If your business (or the business you invest in) needs some help then call me on 0333 9398 503 or email on info@lslltd.co.uk
duration: 8 years 5 months in role and company
pastRole: Consultant Finance Director - enabling growth via strong MI.

name: Anthony Pilkington
title: Managing Director
summary:
We're strong at improving  Xero & Sage accounting systems, sometimes it's literally transformational.

After sitting on the fence we’re now encouraging our clients to migrate to Xero. The reason - our experience in achieving not only major cost savings but also impressive system efficiencies. Some of our clients have five or six Xero add-ons, to their great advantage - sometimes these changes are transformational.

Our clients rely on us to remove book-keeping hassle and improve their profitability - by using our customised financial reporting based on professionally reconciled book-keeping. We also handle payroll for any number of employees.

We are very focussed and provide just two services:

1)      Book-keeping with Management Accounts on Xero or Sage
2)      Payroll with pension auto enrolment

What's unique about BookCheck is that every single set of Management Accounts we produce is both thoroughly checked and issued personally by one of our eight qualified accountants - that's guaranteed.

We never act as ‘Year End’ accountants. We complement part time Financial Directors perfectly - we produce the management information and they use it.

We use settled and proven methodology and are accredited to ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management System by The British Standards Institute.

Established in 1994 BookCheck is a 60 strong professional team.

Our Clients benefit because we:

•	Remove Book-keeping & Payroll problems
•	Produce top quality Management Accounts

So that our Clients are:

•	More focused on their business
•	More profitable by using quality financials
•	Better funded by improved cash flow

We specialise in linking Xero and Sage to Excel, automatically. We call it BAR - BookCheck Advanced Reporting and it transforms the usefulness of the information. It’s totally flexible - if it's in the accounting system then we can report it in any way desired.

All our staff work naturally as a team to solve problems and create consistent top quality reporting. We have settled systems with a huge operational and professional skill base over 25 years in using Sage & Xero since it started.

Specialties:

•	Profit improvement from quality management information
•	Book-keeping HealthCheck from a qualified accountant
•	BAR - BookCheck Advanced Reporting

name: Martin Beckenham
companyName: The Financial Management Centre - Swale and Herne Bay
title: Office Owner
summary:
The Financial Management Centre is a leading financial management consultancy that is committed to helping organisations achieve performance excellence.

In today’s challenging environment, there are many untapped opportunities. Capitalising on them may require new management methods, efficient utilisation of assets and exceptional financial management talent and knowledge. We enable you to succeed through our innovation, performance and passion.

The Financial Management Centre provides you with the necessary skills and insight through its highly qualified and experienced professionals. Whether you need a part-time bookkeeper for a new start-up, a part-time and highly experienced financial controller, a complete finance and accounts department, or an entire enterprise resource planning system, we can examine, develop and answer your needs.

We have three categories of service for organisations of all sizes and in all stages of growth. These services are The Online Bookkeeper, The Local Bookkeeper and The Local Accounts Department.

• The Online Bookkeeper is an innovative and collaborative service that is highly flexible in its delivery to the client. It combines secure and stable online accounting software with the professional services of The Local Bookkeeper.

• The Local Bookkeeper delivers bookkeeping, management accounts, credit control, payroll and self assessment tax return services. It becomes a ‘financial cornerstone’ within your business, providing regular and up-to-date information in language that is easy to understand, giving you the tools to drive your business to success.

• The Local Accounts Department provides professional accounting and financial management services to ambitious and fast-growing businesses, helping them to raise response and performance levels. It enables businesses to outsource entire accounts departments, cutting costs while providing a finance department with the security of qualified and experienced experts.

Specialties: Bookkeeping, Management Accounts, Payroll, Credit Control, Online Accountancy software, Accounts Outsourcing, Business plan

name: Paul Meades
title: Managing Director
summary:
As a business owner, especially one leading a growing business, more than anything else you need support. Finance is just part of the picture.

🔹 There will be things you cannot share with your team until the time is right.
🔹 You may think nobody else ‘get’s it’, leaving you feeling isolated.
🔹 There will be things you don’t know how to resolve that wake you up at night.

It doesn’t have to be this way.

My team and I will:
🔸 Understand your goals
🔸 Hold you accountable to making the changes needed for greater profits
🔸 Share tried, tested and proven advice to building a stronger business
🔸 Show you what you don’t know – training is the key
🔸 Give you peace of mind so you can sleep at night.

If this sounds like the support you need, let’s talk.

My team and I are helping business owners like you to build stronger, more profitable companies. We’d be delighted to talk about how we can help you too. We’re more than accountants, we’re business performance specialists. We’ll get you to a stronger position faster, with more confidence than if you choose to go it alone.

We do this by showing you:
1. How to interpret your businesses financials and key numbers
2. How to set budgets and targets for your business so that your personal needs are met
3. How to monitor and adapt those numbers on a monthly basis so nothing goes wrong
4. How to use your financial insights to make better, informed business decisions
5. How to use your numbers to grow your business in a structured and profitable way

If this sounds like the service you’ve been looking for, let’s talk. Call me on 01923 800 444 or email paul@meadesgroup.com.

Specialities: #BusinessBudgets #Cashflow #Forecasting #BusinessPlanning

The Financial Management Centre becomes a 'Financial Cornerstone' within your business through delivering a proactive service where we provide regular and up to date information in a language which is easy to understand to give you the tools to improve your business's success.

The Financial Management Centre offers highly talented financial management professionals at affordable rates giving small business owners in the mid Sussex and Brighton area access to expertise that were too often not easily accessible for them previously.

These can be delivered on a 'Pay As You Go' service to give you flexibility and take away long term committment worries.  The service can be tailored to your business again to be delivered either on site or off site to suit your needs.

The Financial Management Centre is also able to outsource entire Accounts departments of business's to cut their costs and also have peace of mind that their finance department is safe in the hands of qualified and experienced experts.

Another service that is offered is access to a market leading online accountancy software programme named Xero that can be used solely by you or with the support of a qualified financial management professional that is blended to suit you.

The Financial Management Centre operates to a quality control programme that ensures that the quality of service and the work produced is of a superior standard

Currently working at Acquis Accountants in a highly competitive industry to convert businesses from traditional accounting methods to cloud based accounting solutions to help businesses above the VAT threshold become Making Tax Digital compliant, as HMRC require by the April 2019. Since preparing my final year dissertation on this topic and implementing the research into practice, I have managed to convert 95% of the required clients to cloud based accounting software Xero. If you want to join this stress free journey with Acquis then contact me at danesh@acquis.co.uk

As well as being a driven graduate in Accounting & Finance, I am also a highly motivated award winning entrepreneur.

My great passion for fundraising drove me to create my first company, at the tender age of 10, from which I managed to raise over £8,000 for the NSPCC by the age of 13. I have since continued to excel in the competitive market to get my company to a global scale, supplying nationally and internationally, which in 2016 lead to the Royal visit by HRH The Princess Royal to gain Royal approval for the brands success and growth.

Growing your existing business or starting a new one can be over whelming and challenging especially when you are concentrating all your synergies on winning new clients. Finance and Accounts play a pivotal role in any business.

If you are looking for well experienced and qualified person to give you an honest opinion, be realistic in approach and help you grow your business, you will find my service an add-on asset to your organisation.

With 25 years of experience as a Finance Manager, Controller and Director for various organisations and now running my own accountancy practice for over 15 years, I am well qualified to gain your trust and confidence and work alongside you.

What you are looking for from your most trusted advisor

•     You need a peace of mind ensuring all your compliance needs are covered be it VAT, PAYE, Company tax returns or your own personal tax returns.

•	You need a system where you can view your business finances wherever you are and know your turnover, margins and your profitability at any given point in time for you to make that important decision.

•	You need those reports that accurately let you know what you owe your suppliers and HMRC and what your customers owe you.

•	You need to ensure all your staff are paid on time and have received their correct wages and salaries

•	You want that best finance and taxation advice

•	You want a helping hand where and whenever possible

•	You want an honest and realistic advice, support you and work alongside you representing you and your firm with Banks, HMRC etc.

Our unique proposition

1.	Qualified team of accountants, bookkeepers and payroll solutions providers

2.	3-point check to ensure all your compliance preparations and submissions are accurate for your review and further submissions

3.	Specialist for online Xero/Quick Books cloud accounting software

4.	Our liaison with ACCA and taxation specialist to provide you accurate tax, accounts and finance information.

title: Financial Director | Founder
summary:
For fast-paced ecommerce businesses, one of the biggest obstacles to growth is the availability to navigate new challenges and obstacles with good quality, strategic advice, based on real-time data.

The ability to forecast cash flow, perform ‘what-if’ scenarios and correctly utilise cash can be the difference between having a thriving business and just surviving.

At Boost Accounting this is exactly what we specialise in.

As a proactive accountant and finance director, I partner with fast-growth, online businesses to streamline, systemise and synergise their financial data so they have access to the right financial information when they need it.

By optimising cash levels I was recently able to secure one of my clients an early payment discount with his supplier that helped his £10-million-turnover-business save £100k per year.

For another, I saved the company £60k pa and increased sales capacity by 30% by streamlining their administrative systems.

The reality is, with technology changing so fast, ecommerce businesses need a whole new kind of accountant.

Someone who is tech-savvy, able to advise on the latest trends, apps and platforms, able to think strategically and provide real-time information to aid decision-making, and act as a business advisor, technical director and financial director.

Something traditional accountants unfortunately can’t do.

If you’re an ambitious entrepreneur looking to accelerate growth, or you everything is OK with your current accounting arrangements but are curious to know what you might be missing, I invite you to give me a call.

I’ll be happy to review your business and advise on new trends that could dramatically transform your business’s performance. My advice comes with no-obligation. I simply seek to add value and give peace of mind.

At Boost, we offer a range of solutions for established businesses as well as start-ups. We’re always here to help.

My mantra is “Listen, Understand, Solve, Repeat”
duration: 3 years 11 months in role and company

name: Justin Walton
title: Founder
summary:
Since leaving London corporate life in 2015 I have been working for myself, so what do I do?

I work with businesses and business owners providing tax and business consultancy, information and education.  While I am happy working across business sectors, my focus for more than 20 years has been on businesses in the property, construction, infrastructure and project finance sectors.

I focus on tax advisory rather than tax compliance services.  That includes company/ business purchases and sales, tax due diligence, business structuring, handling HMRC enquiries and general tax and business advice.  Whilst I don't produce accounts and tax returns I have good connections with businesses that provide those services.

I also provide mentoring and related services should you wish to consult me on such matters.  In particular, I work with In-House Tax Functions at Large Corporates and with owners of small businesses.

How so?

I was the Global Head of Tax at John Laing Group where I led the team on tax advisory and compliance matters.  Tax cuts across and touches almost every part of every business so I am used to working with people with a range of skills and experiences.  My tax expertise includes establishing, buying and selling businesses, international expansion, dealing with HMRC disputes and helping businesses implement tax-ready systems, processes and controls.  We grew globally over the 10 years I was with the business and in that time I led the tax function on 3 IPOs - JLIF (buyside), JLEN (sellside) and John Laing Group plc (PE to FTSE 250) and spent 3 years as a NED for a Facilities Management business giving me practical insight into being on a board of directors.

I have also been a tax advisor for KPMG (7 years), BDO (7 years) and MBS (3 years) mostly focusing on business tax and matters affecting business owners.

I love connecting people and I love squash so in 2017 I co-founded The Squash Club Business Network.  We delivered informal, relaxed business networking events with a focus on improving the fitness, health and wellness of our business communities. In 2020 we rebranded as Infinite Networking to encapsulate the potential for a broader events-based business.

I support the Essex Wildlife Trust, Essex Chambers of Commerce and Brentwood Chamber of Commerce.  I am also, a Judge and Sponsor of the Family Business of the Year Awards.

I am a qualified Chartered Tax Advisor and also a member of the Association of Taxation Technicians, the Institute of Directors and the Institute of Leadership and Management.

name: Emanuel Meyer
title: Managing Director
summary:
Emanuel Meyer is a highly experienced Accountant and Tax Partner  with proven skills to develop long lasting relationships with high net worth clients.

He provides all round practical and realistic specialist tax planning advice to private clients, entrepreneurs, partnerships, property investors and businesses particularly relating to profit extraction, capital gains tax and inheritance tax succession planning advice.

Emanuel has extracted significant extra tax advisory work from ongoing compliance base as well as introducing new clients and fees from his contacts and marketing initiatives.

Amongst his achievements :
	He provided specialist tax planning advice for 10 years to members of the Sainsbury family,
	He advised shareholders on the sale of their £160m family company,
	Inheritance Tax planning and reports on Business Property Relief, Discretionary Trusts and Excluded Property Settlements

Career background

Emanuel started his accountancy career at BDO Stoy Hayward after graduating from the London School of Economics with a degree in Economics, Accounting and Finance. He qualified as a Chartered Accountant in 1990 and developed his expertise in personal tax and trusts.

In 1995 he joined Crowe Clark Whitehill as a tax manager and was appointed a private client tax partner in 2002. He provided tax and trust planning for property investors, developers, wealthy families and entrepreneurs as well as organising the firm’s tax training programme.

Emanuel joined H W Fisher as a partner in June 2006 where he provided tax planning strategies and advice to demanding high net worth clients, trustees, charities and family offices.

Emanuel set up Meyer Consultancy Ltd in October 2011 to offer a specialist tax consultancy service to individuals and companies as well as small & medium sized firms of accountants

Specialties: Inheritance Tax planning
Entrepreneurs Relief
Overall family business tax planning
Advice to Family Offices

summary:
A calm voice in the sometimes worrying world of tax. Frequently quoted as one of the UK’s leading experts on American tax, David is a widely known authority, writer and speaker on US tax.

As the first IRS Certifying Acceptance Agent in the UK - way back since the year 2000 - David is one of the few in England screened, checked and authorized by the United States Internal Revenue Service (IRS) to act on behalf of the IRS in assisting individuals with US Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) applications and completing IRS W-7 forms.

David specialises in the often-complex interactions between American and British tax and is able to draw from over 25 years of international and expatriate tax experience, having worked in London, Chicago and New York. Work includes frequent speaking and writing alongside providing advice to other professionals on US and UK tax issues.

Specialties: Fixed fees (including unlimited telephone support) -  US and UK tax returns, Delinquent tax filing, IRS Streamlined procedures, Forms 1040 and 1040NR, Expatriation, Green Card taxation, Renunciation of US Citizenship, Offshore Funds, FATCA, International and Expatriate Tax Planning,  FBARs and FinCEN filing for individuals and cross-border tax planning. ITINs and W-7 forms. Enrolled Agent, dual-qualified, dual handler.

Call for some calming advice now on 020 3542 6330 or email david.treitel@americantaxreturns.co.uk.

name: Mark Friend
title: Chartered Accountant & Managing Director
summary:
What drives me?

Growing up in the 70s I knew I was different. When you are one of the very few non white kids at school you stand out. And being different drove me on to want to be the best.

Secondly I loved Rugby. I played as a winger in my school team. I wasn't the fastest but I could tackle! It didn't matter how big the opponent was- they went down. Two broken arms, concussion- happy days!!
Biggest disappointment however was not being awarded my school colours despite only missing a few games through injury. However this was a key lesson to me- you can only be assured of an outcome if you are in control.

Hence in 1992 at aged 28 (young in those days!) I set up my own accountancy business working from the back bedroom of my house.

Why I might be the right fit for you?

Maybe what I have said resonates with you, maybe not?

But I am a self starter. I started with stacks of ambition,  a couple of clients, a big mortgage  and within a few months a child on the way. I know all about the stresses of building your own business from scratch!!!

I have achieved a high degree of success.

In addition to a wonderful wife and family I have grown, with my business partner and team, an accountancy practice which services over 500 businesses of all sizes form the self employed to construction and engineering businesses turning over £10m.

I am a director/shareholder of a highly successful IT company and with my wife Jan have a family investment company and portfolio of rental properties. I understand that true financial wealth comes from the ability to create channels of passive income.

I have now helped hundreds of business owners to achieve their goals. Everything from setting up their businesses, raising finance, growing businesses, acquiring new businesses, employing staff, buying new business premises, diversifying, building property portfolios, de-risking businesses, saving tax and ultimately selling their businesses.

Check out our website for all the services we can provide.

If you are looking for someone who has a fire in their belly and is passionate about business and helping business owners then let's have a coffee and a chat.

name: Damian Milson
title: Company Director and Owner
summary:
I am the company director of Green Courier, the UK’s only carbon balanced courier company. Operating primarily within the M25 area and delivering nationwide, Green Courier is a family-owned business based on decades of experience in the transport & logistics industry. We’re dedicated to finding sustainable solutions for everyday transportation problems.

I believe that we have a duty to fulfil to the environment and the world at large, and yet transportation is a simultaneously vital and carbon-intensive industry. With Green Courier, we seek to marry the two concepts together in a way that allows us to not compromise on quality whilst also drastically reducing our impact on the environment, and our partnership with the World Land Trust helps us focus our efforts to protecting what remains.

Whilst it’s fine to talk about ideals, the results are what is really important. That’s why it gives me tremendous pride to announce that every single delivery over the last 12 months has been carbon-balanced, through the use of our electric and ultra-low emission vehicles and our work with the WLT.

We have a wide range of packages & services to cater to any and all of your logistics needs. If you’d like to know more, please feel free to give me a call on 0207344445.

“Real progress has been made in improving London’s air quality in recent years and our capital’s businesses have a hugely important role to play in helping us reduce emissions even further. Green Courier, with its low and zero emission delivery vehicles, is doing exactly that and I wish them every success for the future.” – Boris Johnson, Mayor of London

summary:
My name is Alex and I run In The Could Accountancy Ltd (formally A E Accountancy Services)  a Xero specialist accountancy practice based in Essex, supporting clients throughout the UK.

I am a Chartered Management Accountant (CIMA) and Xero Certified Advisor with over 20 years accounting experience.

I have a passion to make the accounting process simple and use the best technology available to give business owners the freedom to spend more time on the things they love.

⭐️WHO DO I HELP?⭐️

I specialise in helping small business owners in the creative industry.
When clients come to me they are often asking themselves the following questions.....

❓Where do I start?
❓Am I doing my accounts and VAT right?
❓How do I pay my staff?
❓Am I making a profit?
❓Do I have enough cash?
❓Am I paying too much tax?
❓Do I need to use software?

and the big one.......

❓❓❓I’m so busy, can I spend less of my time on my accounting❓❓❓


⭐️OUR SOLUTIONS⭐️

✅ Fully Inclusive Accountancy Packages for Limited Companies and Sole Traders.  I look after all your accounting and tax affairs, Including accounts and tax to PAYE and VAT. Giving you peace of mind that everything is being looked after, you wont miss a deadline or pay too much tax ever again.

✅Xero Health Checks and troubleshooting.  I review, fix and tidy up your Xero organisation, I ensure everything is correct and that you are using Xero to its full time saving potential and as a bonus saving year end accountancy fees.

✅Xero set up, software conversion and training.  If you want to run your own Xero bookkeeping, but want to ensure that it is set up correctly or are moving accounting systems to Xero I can do this for you, to give you peace of mind that your starting position is correct.  I can also provide training to ensure you are using Xero effectively to save as much time as possible.


⭐️GET IN TOUCH⭐️

Please get in touch if you would like my help to give you the freedom to spend more time on the things you love, whether it is spending more quality time with your family or working on the profit making areas of your business.

Please visit my website www.inthecloudaccountancy.co.uk  or drop me a message.

name: David Grunberg
title: Founder - Grunberg & Co | Chartered Accountant - North West London | Financial Therapist
summary:
What do business owners really need from an accountant?

“People who take the risk of starting and growing a business in London have had my complete professional focus for two decades and they are a massively varied group; but you can see the patterns in what they all need.

“If you’re expecting a flash of innovation here then stop reading; the quiet truth of 25 years experience is that business owners need four things from us more than anything else.

“The first is personal service from me or my senior colleagues - we can’t duck that or get round it by technology or reorganising our business to spread the senior people more thinly - nor should we - personal service from senior people is what business owners need.

“Secondly, they need us to create value for them - not just in the money we save but in the financial opportunities we help them take. A race to the bottom in accountancy with low fees, low expertise and low value as the goal is an absolute disaster for a business owner because it puts their rewards in jeapordy and opens up the range of risks they are exposed to. People demand value for money; but the challenge to help create value and cut risk is the thing that spurs real collaborations between us and our clients.

“Thirdly lets be very blunt: Clients need a firm with a spotless reputation, relationship and abilty to deal with HMRC. A crisis is no time to find out that your accountant lacks any of these to any degree.

“Fourth is an odd phrase that motivates me and its this:’financial therapy’.

De-stressing people and taking away pain and worry is not a gimmicky idea - far from it - it is the final and perhaps most human truth about the relationships we have with our clients and it’s what my work’s really all about.

We build our practice and client relationships on these four insights and we have some of the highest client retention rates in the industry.

To learn more about how we can help you, please visit www.grunberg.co.uk

I have over 16 years corporate finance and valuation experience, specialising in contentious valuations.  I have significant experience in valuation of businesses and shares, hybrid instruments, and intangible assets for a variety of purposes including shareholder disputes, transactions, financial reporting, restructuring, and private equity.  Since 2002 I have provided expert witness work for courts, mediation and arbitration across different jurisdictions, including the UK, USA, Australia and off-shore jurisdictions (i.e. BVI)

I am UK Senior Vice President of the American Society of Appraisers (ASA) Europe - we hosted our second annual conference in Prague over 13 June to 15 June 2018 and secured renown speakers from the USA (notably Ashwath Damodaron).  I am a Chartered Accountant since 1999, a member of the ICAEW.

I am also a co-founder, contributing author and editor of the annual publication "BVB Insights:  Data and Analysis on UK Private Company Multiples", which has been published by Business Valuation Benchmarks Ltd since 2013 and is subscribed to by Big 4, Second Tier accounting firms, Forensic Practitioners, Corporate Finance boutiques, and the like.  It is also distributed by Business Valuation Resources LLC in the USA and has a small North American subscriber base.

I have spoken at the ICAEW Forensic Conference in 2015 (re Valuations), and ran a 1 hour valuations workshop at the 2016 ICAEW Forensic Conference.  I am a facilitator of the Structured Business Writing Workshop for Grant Thornton UK.
duration: 3 years 3 months in role | 7 years 11 months in company

name: Luke Desmond
title: Founder & CEO
summary:
Hi, Luke Desmond here,

I am the founder and CEO of Crisp Accountancy, an accountancy firm that works with Smart Home businesses to increase profits, master their finances and make better informed financial decisions.

Having been an accountant for more than a decade I have developed a real passion for business, constantly looking at how I can improve my own businesses and sharing these insights with my clients. I am on a mission to improve the financial understanding of business owners. My family’s business works with the smart home industry and I have grown up and worked alongside the industry. As a result of this experience I know the industry and how the businesses within it struggle with their finances. I have condensed the key areas holding businesses back from growing and achieving their potential into five main points:

1. Unknown project profitability
2. Bad admin
3. Poor resource management
4. Poor cash management
5. Cashflow/future forecasting

To solve these problems we developed the Confidence Blueprint, a proven 5 step process designed to take you from being stressed and confused about your numbers to have the confidence to make better decisions, make more money and finally be rewarded for all your hard work.

We work with clients who are tech-driven, growth-oriented and are ready to grow their business to achieve their goals.

So what’s next?

Click on the blue connect button above.
Download a free copy of my eBook at –
Book a discovery call to discuss how we can help your business grow here: https://crispaccountancy.co.uk/contact-us/book-a-discovery-call/

name: Mike Golding
title: Director, specialist in accounting for owner-run businesses and SMEs.
summary:
If you run a family business or SME, or are a self-employed or partnership professional, I can help with your accounting, financial planning and tax advice to ensure you both grow your business and maximise your income. Helping you to achieve your goals, business & personal, is my number one focus.

As your business and personal finances are closely linked, so you will want expert advice for your optimal long-term outcome. I work with you to understand exactly what you want to achieve, and then help you plan how to do it, including:
•	Maximising your investments and property return
•	Helping you grow your business
•	Considering goals for your whole family
•	Keeping your money and assets within your family unit
•	Conversion from Partnership to Limited Company status

All of my work is done on a fixed-fee basis, quoted in advance – so you always know where you stand. I will visit you at your premises, or you are welcome to come to our offices in Chesham or London

Your accounts and planning will be done by me personally: I am a Chartered Accountant, not a salesman. I also have access to specialist colleagues, if you have very particular requirements. This means that you get the best of both worlds: you get all the advantages of a personal service and affordable fees – while still having full access to large-practice specialists if you need them

I also offer specialist sector accounting, for:
•	Solicitors – including quadruple-entry bookkeeping where required
•	Medical Practices
•	Film & Entertainment Industry workers – permitted expenses, per diems, etc.
•	Independent Schools – accounts & audit

I am a Director of Littlestone Golding, an established Chartered accountancy practice based in Bucks & one in London. I am a Chartered Accountant & Registered Auditor, providing financial planning support for clients in the UK

Please do give me a call on 01494 775411 or email me on mike@littlestonegolding.co.uk, to discuss your financial planning, accountancy or audit needs

name: David Eaton
title: Virgin StartUp Business Mentor
summary:
My passion is to help business owners and individuals increase profitability and succeed as entrepreneurs. I approach clients with an open mind and together we find their key drivers and issues. I work as part of the client team to find and implement creative solutions.

I work at both the strategic and operational levels. I trained as a Chartered Accountant with Price Waterhouse working in London and the Middle East. I’ve previously acted as a non-executive board member of the Anglia Housing Group and chaired a subsidiary housing association, serving on the Group Finance and Group Audit Committees. I have been a business owner – so I know how that feels.

Working as a finance director, I have run a day to day finance function. This included setting up new financial reporting and forecasting systems, cash-flow strategies and implementing new legislation affecting businesses. In collaboration the Board, I won a High Court enforcement of 100% of a substantial six figure debt. I have conducted strategic reviews and implemented marketing strategies and led on innovation. I have provided corporate governance advice, an HR and training function, and a H&S system. I deliver training, director development and mentoring.

Using experience with dozens of organisations, I bring hands-on delivery of agreed outcomes using new thinking and best practice. I support employee engagement in firms leading to higher productivity and satisfaction. I have a wide network of specialists on which I draw to deliver additional services for my clients.

Apart from helping a number of businesses to grow and many individuals to thrive, my achievements include chairmanship of an urban regeneration multi-agency partnership, being a key member of the team which built a new restaurant for Westminster Abbey. I was appointed MBE in 2006 for services to the Territorial Army.

I welcome opportunities to work with ambitious new clients. You are welcome to call me on 07841 215182.

name: Paul Pritchard
title: Owner
summary:
Thanks for taking the time to look at my profile.

I am a financial accounting executive with broad experience in all general aspects of accounting, taxation and financial management.


WHO DO I WORK WITH?

Any business owner or self employed person regardless of whether you are just starting out or have been in business for years.

I have direct experience of working  along with small businesses and individuals, particularly startup businesses and small owner managed limited companies.


HOW CAN I HELP YOUR BUSINESS?

I use an award winning online book keeping system to help you manage your records. This means that my team and I can log into your accounts at any time during the year and give you some meaningful tax saving advice.

You no longer have to enter all your purchases and expenses, as we give you an app so that you just photograph your receipts and they get automatically entered into your software. So no more faded or lost receipts, and you can be confident that all your expenses are properly claimed to help reduce your tax bill.

Using this system will save you time, money and stress - guaranteed.



Specialties: Income tax, corporation tax, PAYE and payroll, VAT, book keeping and general accountancy services for sole traders, partnerships and small limited companies.

Since April 2020, I have been working with an exciting range of businesses and people as an adviser and executive coach.  In July 2020, I co-launched Impact Central, an accelerator whose mission is to grow a community that supports impact start-ups and let's them thrive.

Prior to this, I was a partner in Grant Thornton for over 20 years, having joined the firm back in 1983.  I held a number of senior roles both in client-facing and leadership capacities.  Most recently, I led Grant Thornton's team responsible for building and maintaining strategic and long-lasting relationships with key clients; I also led Grant Thornton’s activities in the retail sector for a number of years.

Previously, I was Managing Partner of Grant Thornton’s London Office for seven years; in that time, we grew the London business to over £300m revenue by broadening the firm’s offerings, investing in new capabilities and providing solutions to help clients grow.  In that period, I was also a member of the firm’s National Leadership Board.

I have considerable experience in corporate finance, having specialised in transaction advisory services on buy-outs, acquisitions, disposals and financial reconstructions in both public and private company situations.  I was managing partner of Grant Thornton’s Corporate Finance business for six years, when revenues grew fourfold.

My wife - Liz - and I have two teenage daughters - Milly, who is at Exeter University, and Elena, who is studying for her A levels.  As well as time in London, we live in Harpenden with a holiday apartment in Brighton. My other passions include watching football (a long standing season ticket holder at Chelsea FC), yoga (addict), running (half marathon is pretty much my limit), music (rooted in being a teenager in the 70s), reading, film, art and travel.  In August 2014 I spent two weeks with Milly doing voluntary work in Tanzania and we both returned with Elena in 2018; the trips were truly amazing experiences that I would recommend to anyone.

name: David Lewis FCA
title: Director & owner - practical financial management support for SMEs
summary:
Are you selling a business and need help through due diligence to get the deal over the line? Or are you an accountant looking to provide more added value services?

•	It’s tough selling a business, the negotiations, the strain, the owners’ attachment to the business. And then there are the intrusive questions and the need to also keep the business on track.

•	Running a small accountancy firm is also challenging, dealing with numerous clients & continual deadlines. It’s tough keeping up with the day to day, let alone having the capacity for projects such as due diligence or business planning… or to think about opportunities for helping clients.

★ MY WORK splits into 3 main areas:   ★

☆	HELPING BUSINESSES THROUGH SALE with hands on support through due diligence (especially where a large firm is doing the DD!). I also carry out due diligence for people buying small businesses.
☆ OTHER ADVISORY ASSIGNMENTS, including:
	> financial projections and business planning
> helping businesses develop robust and forward looking approaches to financial and risk management
> investigations into unexpected results
☆SUPPORT TO ACCOUNTANTS to help them deliver and develop these services to their larger clients.

★	MY BACKGROUND   ★

A former partner in a West End firm of accountants (now part of RSM), I was involved in its management as well as staff training & development. In 2004 I formed Camrose Consulting to help SMEs address their commercial challenges.

The clients I’ve worked with include small family-owned companies, private equity backed businesses, a charity employing 1,200 people, an acquisitive FTSE 250 consumer goods group. My industry experience includes software, care, food (manufacturing & wholesale), cosmetics and engineering, so I have diverse knowledge to draw upon.

★	DO YOU NEED ANOTHER PERSPECTIVE?   ★

If you have a big project or a knotty problem to tackle, then let’s talk. Contact me on david@camroseconsulting.co.uk or on 07836 331677.

We recognise that clients now want more from their accountants than the annual accounts; they want guidance, advice and a helping hand when it is needed - be that with the production and interpretation of management accounts or with their personal financial planning. About My Company
The Local Bookkeeper Basildon is a leading nationwide network of bookkeeping and financial management firms that specialise in helping the small to medium sized businesses in Basildon and the surrounding areas.

The Local Bookkeeper Basildon becomes a “Financial Cornerstone” within your business through delivering a proactive service where we provide regular and up to date information in a language which is easy to understand to give you the tools to improve your business’s success.

The Local Bookkeeper Basildon offers highly talented financial management professionals at affordable rates giving small business owners in Basildon and the surrounding areas access to expertise that were too often not easily accessible for them previously.

The Local Bookkeeper Basildon delivers five professional services of bookkeeping, management accounts, credit control, payroll and self assessment tax services to businesses in Basildon and the surrounding areas.

These can be delivered on a 'Pay As You Go' service to give you flexibility and take away long term commitment worries. The service can be tailored to your business again to be delivered either on site or off site to suit your needs.

The Local Bookkeeper Basildon is also able to outsource entire Accounts departments of business's to cut their costs and also have peace of mind that their finance department is safe in the hands of qualified and experienced experts.

Another service that is offered is access to a market leading online accountancy software programme named Kashflow that can be used solely by you or with the support of a qualified financial management professional that is blended to suit you.

The Local Bookkeeper Basildon operates to a quality control programme that ensures that the quality of service and the work produced is of a superior standard.

Specialties: Bookkeeping, Management Accounts, Payroll, Credit Control, Online Accountancy Software, Accounts Outsourcing, Business Plan

summary:
Charles Lazarevic advises law firms, corporates, regulators, central and local government and law enforcement agencies on forensic accounting, contentious business valuations and corporate governance issues.

He is a chartered accountant and forensic accountant with over 35 years experience working in the accounting, financial, economic and commercial aspects of complex business disputes.

Charles is an experienced expert witness, having given oral evidence in courts and tribunals in the UK and abroad on over 30 occasions. He also specialises in contentious valuations of both companies and businesses, and business assets, including intellectual property assets.

A former senior equity partner with a top-10 firm in London, Charles founded Vero Consulting's investigations team including accountants, analysts and asset tracing experts experienced in corporate, regulatory and criminal investigations.

He is a CEDR-trained mediator, specialising in cases involving complex business and financial issues and experienced in expert determinations and adjudications.

Specialties: Financial investigations and analysis, financial advisory, negotiations, business valuations, compensation claims, expert witness, international arbitrations.

name: Justin Benedict
companyName: JBC Tax Solutions Ltd T/A Benedicts
title: Managing Director
summary:
Are you one of the thousands of UK small business owners looking for an efficient, effective & proactive accountancy & tax planning service to help you achieve maximum Return On Investment? Are you busy juggling your job & your life as well as your accounting & tax? Would you like to find an accountancy solution that allows you to pass over your affairs in complete confidence that you’re in capable hands? Yes? Then you’re in the right place.

As principle accountant at JBC Tax Solutions trading as Benedicts, I’m a Fellow Member of the Institute of Financial Accountants & a Member of the Federation of Tax Advisors. Based in Finchley, we provide a proactive accounting & tax advisory service to our loyal & discerning client base.   Particularly conversant in the affairs of small business, we guide & advise dentists, opticians & locum doctors in their business strategies. Working on a fixed price arrangement, we provide a highly personal service.

If you’re seeking a sound, honest & jargon-free accountancy & tax planning strategy for your business, it’s time to get in touch. Our proactive approach has helped a broad range of clients, since 1989, to streamline their accountancy, identify comprehensive tax planning opportunities and increase their profitability & business success.

We know that accounting is about a lot more than numbers.  To provide the service you need & deserve, we look behind the numbers & make it our business to really understand your business. By working this way we find the very best solutions for your unique business situation, taking care of everything from your bookkeeping to management accounts through to the preparation of your annual accounts & more.

When you work with Benedicts, you’re in good hands. You can forget all the usual worries associated with book-keeping, accounting & tax. We’ll make sure you never miss a tax planning opportunity or a tax deadline ever again.

Contact us: justin@jbenedict.co.uk

Skytax Accounting is a specialist tax and accountancy solutions provider for flexible workers, such as IT and engineering contractors, freelancers and locums, and for salaried GPs, hospital doctors and consultants. We enable our clients to take home up to 88% of their fee income. Our expertise is proven through the experience of our clients who regularly claim up to £3,000 in tax rebates every year.

Skytax Accounting has unrivalled specialist expertise in the medical field.  We are experienced at identifying the unique tax issues faced by doctors, and we deliver a highly personal service to meet the needs of their busy hospital or practice schedule.

Our practice is based on high ethical values. Our fees are transparent and we make sure that our clients understand the process. We never hold client’s money and restrict ourselves to purely accounting matters. Therefore we are fully compliant as per MSC legislations.

At the same time, we have created robust and compliant partnership frameworks from which referring organisations, such as recruitment consultancies supplying doctors, locums and medical professionals, can benefit. We also are committed to remain compliant company in accordance with the requirements of the Bribery Act 2010.

Mark's role within THP is to ensure the company stays ahead of the pack and flourishes.  He joined THP as the manager of the Wanstead branch and quickly became Operations and Finance Director.  He has plenty of practical innovation under his belt and has been responsible for not only the smooth running and progression of the firm but has also implemented major improvements to the IT infrastructure and project-managed a major modernisation of head office.

Mark is responsible for all four offices and also THP Group which provides the IT, HR, Finance and Marketing support for the firm.

Part of Mark's role is to ensure that people and departments not only talk to each other, but that they share ideas - whether they're about marketing, finance, sales, strategy or any other topic that can result in THP offering a better service.

Mark is also responsible for the development of the firm's trainees and has recently taken on the mantel of the companies QRPT ensuring that all our trainees are developing and gaining the experience and knowledge that they need to become the next generation within THP.

"We've a lot of talented people and our way of doing things increasingly attracts ambitious newcomers who are looking for a fresh approach. That's good for us and even better news for our clients".

Visionary Accountants was established in 2008 to offer an alternative to expensive, traditional high-street accountancy practices. We want to know our clients personally and see them on a regular basis. We don't believe an annual visit is good enough for our clients' needs.

Our mission - to reward our clients' efforts by making their businesses more profitable, paying less tax and growing their wealth. Above all to simplify their lives and have fun along the way.

We are now achieving this mission through quality monthly management accounting, strong business support, bespoke tax advice and effective tax planning, inheritance tax planning and tax efficient structures.

An ambitious, entrepreneurial and passionate Finance Director with 20+ years of driving commercial realism at the most senior level with both SME start-ups and world-leading organisations, predominately in the emerging technology sector.
From early in my career I have pioneered the automation of financial systems and led dedicated teams in the UK, US and Europe to leverage substantial savings and revenue for £multi-million organisations. I am excited by fast growth and change – and have built a reputation for delivering long-term financial strategies that provide stable platforms that act as a springboard for corporate expansion.
I was a key member in the formation of a cutting-edge Cambridge manufacturing business set up with the strategic aim of an exit within the first 5 years, which was achieved. The business was recognised as a Sunday Times ‘Tech Track’ fast growing enterprise where, together with my role as FD, I helped shape change and enhanced relationships between departments, clients and key stakeholders to realise commercial ambitions.
I am a trusted sounding board at C-level across numerous diverse businesses, and have an innate ability to cut through complex layers of jargon to provide a real-world view of performance and control. I am an extremely hands-on leader across all functional areas of the business, with a track record of spotting sector and commercial gaps that offer revenue and growth opportunities.

summary:
Paul trained in accountancy, law and economics from an early age and obtained a degree in these subjects at Cardiff University. He then went onto train with Dearden Farrow (Now BDO) based in Fleet Street, London and qualified as an Associate Chartered Accountant in 1982.

Paul had several roles in Industry before becoming a partner in a small accountancy practice.

In 1993 Paul was invited to become a Fellow of the Institute of Chartered Accountants.

In April 2004 Paul set up PWA to provide a more proactive service to the ever increasing client base and was pleased to be joined by both Sharon and Karen in this new venture.

Since then the business has grown enormously.

Paul forms many new companies each year offering each practical advice and support to help them get going. Now days there are many fines for late filing of company set up forms and Paul specialises in helping people avoid these fines as well as offering set up advice on matters such as VAT, Corporation Tax and company structure and shareholding.

In recent years Paul has gained experience in company valuations, buying and selling companies and helping people achieve exit plans which are both tax efficient as well as allowing the business to continue into the future. Paul also can help if you are seeking investor finance to develop and grow your business.

Paul is company secretary for many small and large companies and has considerable skills in advising on all Company Law matters.

Paul specialises in Corporation Tax, Income Tax and Capital Gains Tax and has in depth knowledge and experience of working via an offshore company especially a company based in the Channel Islands.

name: Michael Hill
title: Owner
summary:
I am a qualified tax professional and with almost twenty years experience as a Partner in two different accountancy practices, I consider myself to be an accountant “qualified by experience”.

My background is largely based with owner managed businesses, providing a wide range of accountancy and taxation services, ensuring that clients comply with the statutory regulations and wherever possible, seeking to legally minimise tax liabilities.

I try to get to know my clients well to ensure that I understand their requirements and what services they need from me and the staff at Collett Hulance.  The personal touch is extremely important to me and I believe is an asset strongly valued by my clients.

During my career I have dealt with a wide range of persons and personalities, on one occasion setting up a Company in the British Virgin Islands and in another instance, dealing with a takeover of one of my larger clients by a multi national Company, which involved learning a whole range of new skills. This whole exercise proved to be a great challenge and the ultimate successful sale of my clients business was one of the most rewarding achievements of my career to date.

I have also guided clients on a number of mergers and acquisitions over the years often mediating between the two parties to facilitate the smooth transition from business ideas to a profitable trading reality.

I am though, primarily, a general accountancy practitioner specialising in corporate and income tax planning and compliance with the emphasis on the personal approach, not to mention my golfing prowess !

http://www.assuredacc.co.uk/

At Assured Accounting, we provide affordable accountancy services for a fixed, monthly fee to small to medium-sized businesses, contractors, and Accountancy firms nationwide.

Our services offer compliant accounting and taxation at around one third of the costs of directly employing staff in the UK – we keep our costs to a minimum and pass this saving directly onto our clients. As such, our service is predominantly electronic and doesn’t include supplementary tax advice.

We guarantee that all compliance matters for businesses and individuals are met on a timely basis without incurring fines or late payment penalties.

No matter the size of your business – an individual sole trader or a limited company with employees, we have an accounting service just for you.

name: Ken Scott
title: Owner
summary:
I joined Mercer & Hole in 1979 and was admitted to partnership in 1981. Having trained in the City of London, I qualified as a Chartered Accountant in 1972 and a Chartered Tax adviser in 1974.
As a private client partner, I have managed a team which advises mainly individual taxpayers, including specialist areas such as Lloyds Underwriters and those who are not resident and/or not domiciled in the UK. I headed up the private client department for many years and this led naturally to developing expertise in wider areas such as trusts, charities and investment business. Following the general tightening up of investment business regulations, I gained the coveted G60 qualification in relation to pension transfer work.

I have a wide experience of personal financial planning, including wills and inheritance tax planning, also in relation to the provision of accounting and taxation advice for trusts and charities. Pulling all of this together, I see myself as a “single adviser” point of reference, including the valuation of business interests in divorce and other instances of severing business relationships.

I am a registered Trust and Estate Practitioner and a founder member of the Association of Charity Independent Examiners. I am a Director and the Company Secretary of Mercer & Hole Trustees Limited, our wholly-owned Trust Corporation.


Outside of the office, my main interests are in serving Rotary and Scouting.
.

Specialties: Tax and trust planning

Practical Payroll Solutions is a payroll company that prides itself on being able to react quickly and efficiently – our robust processing system means that we can handle large variances of labour, including The Transfer of Undertaking (Protection of Employment) Regulation (TUPE) transfers.

All directors and key personnel are long established and qualified members of the Institute of Payroll Professionals. Practical Payroll Solutions also complies with the ISO 9001: 2008 Quality Management System, meaning all of our clients are assured a professional service, one you would expect from a reputable payroll company.

title: Owner

name: Paul Cooper
title: Managing Director
summary:
Do you worry about not having enough cash in the business bank account? If so then you're not alone amongst business owners who are stressed by critical cashflow problems.

I have a decade of experience with helping small business owners to become more profitable, and my team of business advisors and accountants use expertise with the key numbers to make cashflow worries a thing of the past.

Overcoming struggles to grow my businesses in the past taught me valuable lessons along the way. That’s why my focus now is to take away the stress and confusion involved in successfully growing a business and to help owners to provide their families with financial security and the life that they want to lead.

I help business owners in London and the SE, who have ltd companies with a t/o in the £150K to £6m range with 1 to 80 employees. They appreciate the value of technology and information, are looking to grow their business and are prepared to take action to do so. They fall into two main areas:

• Business owners working long hours yet still struggling to get the financial rewards:
- They often can't see how to become more profitable and take home more money, and that's where our business advisory and cashflow advisory services help.
– We help increase profits, providing owners and their families with the life that they want.

• Business owners who are stressed out and struggling with their finances and bookkeeping:
- They struggle to put aside the money they should for taxes and are in the dark with their business finances.
- By putting in place an efficient cloud system (using Xero, Receiptbank and profit analysis software) and an expert bookkeeper to free up their time and provide them with financial clarity they can pay their bills when due and sleep easily.

If you are a small business owner and are looking to grow and increase company profits to provide a better life for you and your family then please email me at pcooper@clearstonebusiness.co.uk .
duration: 10 years 8 months in role and company

name: Technical-E Ltd
title: Owner
summary:
Technical-E is part of the Legitas Group. We provide specialist accountancy and tax services to agencies, contractors and freelancers across a wide range of sectors, with a single aim – to save our clients money by helping them to be as tax-efficient as legally possible.
We offer an Umbrella Service and Limited Company accounting, allowing us to support every type of contractor and freelancer. We will advise you on the best option, whether Limited Company or Umbrella, for your individual circumstances.

What sets us apart?

No call centres
Contractors will always speak to an industry specialist who can give the advice needed.

Dedicated Account Manager
Every client of Technical-E is allocated an Account Manager upon joining.

Low fees
We offer competitive fees while maintaining the highest standard of professional service.

Simplicity
We provide a hassle free service with the minimum amount of paperwork.

Expertise
Our staff have years of experience of working with contractors through Limited Company Accounting and Umbrella. This is reflected in the standard of service and advice our clients receive together with our 100% retention rate to date. Our staff are fully trained and qualified to ACCA level.

Specialties: Limited Company Accounting, Umbrella service, Tax Refund, Company Formation
